messages.subject: Re: Betsy Was: Structure
messages.msgSnippet:
And learning whatever you can about deschooling may help, too. Betsy Betsy, Thank you for the tips!  I will definitely try them out.  I LOVE French
In
messages.messageBody:
And learning whatever you can about "deschooling" may help, too.

Betsy


Betsy,
Thank you for the tips! I will definitely try them out. I LOVE French
In Action...took it in college. I always sit to watch when I catch it on
tv!
I deschooled back when we started four years ago. Then it seemed like I
didn't deschool enough, so we did some more. But these schoolish notions
still persist! I think she is afraid to venture out on her own. She went
to school from Pre-K through 4th grade. Alot of stuff already ingrained in
her. She loves anything to do with Ancient Egypt, so she is venturing out
to learn all she can on that. I am hoping she will gain confidence to
continue to do so.
Peace,
Sarah

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
